meta-review.comment: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged takes the fun and ramps it up with more vehicles, events, and a hint of nostalgia, but it doesn't quite revolutionize the formula. The added depth in racing and new vehicle classes inject some excitement, but the challenges and rewards leave a little to be desired. If you're craving more toy-based racing, this sequel will scratch that itch, but don't expect a groundbreaking overhaul.
